descriptions: Teams net points while player is on the court.
Teams net points while player is on the court.

videos.description: Kendrick Nunn pokes the ball free to set up a wide-open 3-pointer for Andre Iguodala.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Iguodala drains a triple off of Nunn's steal) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Iguodala drains a triple off of Nunn's steal

videos.description: Bryn Forbes gets fouled by Kendrick Nunn as he knocks down a corner 3 for the Bucks.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Forbes gets the and-1 triple from the corner) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Forbes gets the and-1 triple from the corner

videos.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo goes one-on-one with Jimmy Butler and muscles his way for a one-handed jam.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis bulldozes Butler for a one-handed jam) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis bulldozes Butler for a one-handed jam

videos.description: Giannis Antetokounmpo spins past Dewayne Dedmon for a bucket to earn his first ever playoff triple-double.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Giannis spins his way to first playoff triple-double) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Giannis spins his way to first playoff triple-double

videos.description: Khris Middleton and Goran Dragic have to be separated after tempers flare between the two.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Dragic, Middleton engage in late-game scuffle) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Dragic, Middleton engage in late-game scuffle

videos.description: Udonis Haslem sends a chair to the ground while trying to fire up the Heat on the bench.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Udonis Haslem tosses a chair while trying to fire up Heat) 2021/5/29 ESHEET

videos.headline: Udonis Haslem tosses a chair while trying to fire up Heat
